newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK restaurant receipts rise six pct in Q3 of 1996.
newsitem.headline: HK restaurant receipts rise six pct in Q3 of 1996.

text.p: Total restaurant receipts increased six percent to HK$14 billion in the third quarter of 1996 from the same period last year, provisional Census and Statistics Department data showed on Monday.
Receipts of bars increased by eight percent, while those of Chinese restaurants rose three percent.
Fast food outlets' receipts increased by 10 percent and those of non-Chinese restaurants also grew by 10 percent.
In the second quarter of 1996, total restaurant receipts increased three percent year-on-year to HK$13 billion.
